verbs.description: Dennis Rodman [V: has] formed a close friendship with North Korean leader Kim Jong - un in recent years . Rodman will even reportedly be in Singapore at the same time as Donald Trump .

[ARG0: Dennis Rodman] has [V: formed] [ARG1: a close friendship with North Korean leader Kim Jong - un] [ARGM-TMP: in recent years] . Rodman will even reportedly be in Singapore at the same time as Donald Trump .
Dennis Rodman has formed a close friendship with North Korean leader Kim Jong - un in recent years . Rodman [V: will] even reportedly be in Singapore at the same time as Donald Trump .

Dennis Rodman has formed a close friendship with North Korean leader Kim Jong - un in recent years . [ARG1: Rodman] [ARGM-MOD: will] [ARGM-ADV: even] [ARGM-ADV: reportedly] [V: be] [ARG2: in Singapore] [ARGM-TMP: at the same time as Donald Trump] .
